div.ab: Moorish Palace or AlcazarFortress on a rocky peninsula between the river EresemaEresma & a ravine. many ceilings gilt & with sentences from Koran. Plaster Compartments

Under the Torre de siete suelosTower of the Seven Floors are The other unseen stories or vaults in which is treasure & the [drawing: animal] called BelludoBelludo or Velludo: a headless horse that supposedly haunts Granada. See, for instance, Echeverría, Paseos por Granada (1814 edn), vol. 1, pp. 210-11. (WG may be drawing on Echeverría's earlier edition here) pursued by seven hell hounds. The Tower on W.West side of Alhambra not far from water tower at South point. There are not more than 3 or 4 stories above ground. The King is said to have retired by this gate but perhaps he came out of it to meet King Ferdinand at St. Salvador near the present Passeo de Xenilwalk along the river Genil –

Arabic M.S.Manuscript in Escurial says. Mankeri & Nakeri 2 terrible angels who set a man upright in his Tomb.. & examine his belief in Unity & the Apostle. Quis est Dominus tuus & quae Religio tua & quis Propheta tuusWho is your Lord and what is your Religion and who is your Prophet?. Only a sect believed in this.Casiri, Bibliotheca, vol. 1, p. 204.

In 1412 the hall of Arteson in the AlcazarFortress of Segovia with a gothic inscription. Esta obra mando fazer la muy esclarecida Señora Reina Doña Catalina &c madre del Señor Rey Don Juan 1412The very illustrious Lady Queen Doña Catalina etc, mother of the Lord King Don Juan, ordered this work to be done [Llaguno y Amírola: 'facer'], 1412..Abridged from Llaguno y Amírola, Noticias, vol. 1, p. 302.
